          java.lang.String searchType,
          java.lang.String searchText)
        A common search method which takes in the search location, the search type, and the search text
        Parameters:
        searchLocation - The panel from which the method was accessed(so that it updates the correct table with search results)
        searchType - The search criteria
        searchText - The text to be searched
